DOC.brief_summary: Our hypothesis is that totally Implantable Venous Access Devices in neoplastic patients modify body image and self-representation. Therefore, the purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of psychological intervention on patients undergone this surgical practice.
DOC.brief_title: Totally Implantable Venous Access Devices: Quality of Life and Body Image
